actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the section of title 5, United States Code, dealing with foreign gifts and decorations, to preclude the sale of such gifts and to direct the display of certain such gifts in the Smithsonian Institution.

summary.text: Sets requirements for the disposal of government property, where such property is received by government officials as foreign gifts and decorations. Precludes the sale of such gifts. Directs the display of such gifts in the Smithsonian Institution.

titles.title: A bill to amend the section of title 5, United States Code, dealing with foreign gifts and decorations, to preclude the sale of such gifts and to direct the display of certain such gifts in the Smithsonian Institution.
